Demon.desc: Demons have a chance on-hit to deplete the target's current mana and deal true damage equal to the mana depleted.

Dragon.desc: While 2 Dragons are in play, all Dragons are immune to magic damage.

Exile.desc: Exiles start combat with a shield equal to 100% of maximum health when not placed adjacent to an ally. The shield does not scale with  ability power.

Glacial.desc: Glacials have a chance on-hit to  stun for 2 seconds.

Imperial.desc: A select number of Imperials deal double damage.

Noble.desc: Grants 100 armor and basic attacks restore 35 health on-hit to the following:

Phantom.desc: While 2 Phantoms are in play, a random enemy will begin combat with 100 health. Works against epic monsters, but deals less damage.

Pirate.desc: While 3 Pirates are in play, you begin each PvP round with a chest that grants between  0 and 4.

Robot.desc: Robots begin combat with full mana.

Void.desc: While 3 Voidlings are in play, your team gains 50% armor penetration.

Wild.desc: Wildlings generate Fury on-hit, up to 5. Each stack gives 7% attack speed.

Yordle.desc: Yordles have a chance to  dodge enemy attacks.

Assassin.desc: Passive: At the start of combat, Assassins stealth for a short duration and jump behind the farthest enemy.Synergy: Assassins have bonus critical strike damage:

Blademaster.desc: Blademasters have a 45% chance to perform a multi-attack.

Elementalist.desc: Passive: Elementalists' basic attacks grant twice as much mana.Synergy: Beginning combat with 3 Elementalists will summon an Elemental adjacent to one of your Elementalists, in the closest empty hex to an enemy. This effect will fail if there are no valid spaces.

Guardian.desc: Beginning combat with 2 Guardians will grant 40 armor to all units that start adjacent to a Guardian.

Gunslinger.desc: Gunslingers have a 50% chance for their attacks to hit additional enemies.

Knight.desc: Knights ignore a flat amount of damage from basic attacks.

Ranger.desc: Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to gain double attack speed for 3 seconds.

Shapeshifter.desc: While 3 Shapeshifters are in play, activating their Special Ability will grant +100% maximum health, as well as healing for the amount gained.

Sorcerer.desc: Passive: Sorcerers' basic attacks grant twice as much mana.Synergy: Sorcerers grant  ability power to their team.
